targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "StepCount" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "FlightsClimbed" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "DistanceWalkingRunning" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "DistanceCycling" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "AppleStandTime" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "AppleExerciseTime" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "FunctionalStrengthTraining" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "Cycling" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "Running" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "Squash" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "DownhillSkiing" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "Swimming" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "unit"
